mapper.insert: insert into medical_resources_userinfo(u_type, open_id, nick_name, avatar_url, gender, store_name, m_longitude, m_latitude, nation, city, province, district, street, street_number) values(#{u_type}, #{open_id}, #{nick_name}, #{avatar_url}, #{gender}, #{store_name}, #{m_longitude}, #{m_latitude}, #{nation}, #{city}, #{province}, #{district}, #{street}, #{street_number} )
mapper.select: select id,u_type as uType, open_id as openId, nick_name as nickName, avatar_url as avatarUrl, gender, nation, province, city, district, street, street_number as streetNumber, store_name as store_name, m_longitude as mLongitude, m_latitude as mLatitude from medical_resources_userinfo where id = #{id}
